ai-tha-ap39:2.2_0: we sat down on the Saṅgha.
ai-tha-ap39:3.2_0: all the wealth in his dispensation.
ai-tha-ap39:3.3_0: Having given food to the Sangha,
ai-tha-ap39:3.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
ai-tha-ap39:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap39:4.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
ai-tha-ap39:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap39:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa Kuṇḍa.
